meta.title: Design Lab
meta.description: CSSSR provides design team services to help our clients create top-to-bottom solutions for their projects.

hero.heading: Go from cool idea to insanely great product
hero.text: Our Humble Team is ready to help you create great products with a focus on what really matters: users, investors, and revenue.

nexar.heading: Nexar. New apps for the automotive industry leader
nexar.text: Nexar uses AI to help drivers avoid accidents and make insurance claims. Received investments from Samsung, Alibaba, and others.

erste.heading: ERSTE bank security. New way to sign off payments
erste.text: The ERSTE token app allows you to control your bank-direct payments and financial permissions from one single place.

stoovo.heading: Stoovo. Fintech MVP in 2 months
stoovo.text: Stoovo is a service that monitors one’s financial health and suggests gig jobs when there’s a need to pay off loans, taxes, or bills.

nauto.heading: Nauto. Web apps for vehicle fleets
nauto.text: Nauto is the only real-time, AI-enabled driver and fleet safety platform to predict, prevent, and reduce the number of car accidents.

marcel.heading: Marcel. From MVP to 25K users
marcel.text: Marcel is a platform that helps young artists connect with their audience, manage their portfolios, market and sell their art.

halff.heading: Halff. Fintech app concept for the pre‑seed startup
halff.text: Halff is next-generation mobile banking for automating budgets and creating new habits to reach financial goals.

aleno.heading: Aleno. Swiss startup scaling up
aleno.text: Aleno is a cutting-edge reservation management system built to boost restaurant businesses.

devBlock.heading: Go from cool idea to insanely great product
devBlock.text: You can read about our core mission, i.e. making complex websites & web applications, on the relevant page.
